pr_title: GEODE-7663: Fix delta update inconsistency in client cache.

timeline.message:
GEODE-7663: Fix delta update inconsistency in client cache.

 * When performing delta update on client, there is a possibility that
   some delta update is not yet applied on client cache.
 * If apply delta update, some queued delta update would be lost -- as
   entry versioning will discard these delta updates when received later.
 * Now it will check if there is a versioning mismatch, if it happened,
   the full value from server will be applied instead of just the delta.

timeline.bodyText: I think this method can be entirely removed now that there is an event field in the test, and calls to it can be replaced with usages of the field.
timeline.author: DonalEvans

timeline.bodyText: It should be ">" not "!=", in the case of "<", you should not call the get.
timeline.author: gesterzhou

replies.bodyText: I am not sure if client delta put will generate region version less than current local cache version. However, use ">" might be more clear in this case.
replies.author: pivotal-eshu
